name: Kali Story First Chapter Lifting the Maya veil

metadata.name: Entropy
metadata.description:
In this moment of the time, 3rd of August 2022,  everyone on planet Earth is clinging on pieces of information in order to know what is coming next.. The only right answer for you, fellow human being is: LOOK INSIDE. Each of us are a compass we need to keep in balance in order to be on the right path. 

As above, so below... infinite mirror.
